thread.title: BRIEF-Certain Shareholders Of Zenyatta Ventures Mail Information Circular & Letter To Co's Shareholders

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Certain Shareholders Of Zenyatta Ventures Mail Information Circular & Letter To Co's Shareholders

organizations.name: zenyatta ventures mail information circular & letter to co

text:
April 18, 2018 / 3:55 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Certain Shareholders Of Zenyatta Ventures Mail Information Circular & Letter To Co's Shareholders Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 18 (Reuters) - Francis Dubé, Together with a Group of Certain Shareholders: 
* FRANCIS DUBÉ, TOGETHER WITH A GROUP OF CERTAIN SHAREHOLDERS SAY HAVE MAILED AN INFORMATION CIRCULAR & LETTER TO SHAREHOLDERS OF ZENYATTA VENTURES 
* FRANCIS DUBÉ, TOGETHER WITH A GROUP OF CERTAIN SHAREHOLDERS SAY LETTER WAS IN RESPECT OF UPCOMING MAY 11 SPECIAL MEETING OF ZENYATTA SHAREHOLDERS 
* FRANCIS DUBÉ, SOME SHAREHOLDERS OF ZENYATTA- “CONCERNED” ANY CAPITAL RAISED BY ZENYATTA WHILE CURRENT BOARD IS IN PLACE WILL NOT FUND ALBANY PROGRAM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
